column4: ok so i even changed out the power supply and ubuntu still shuts down at boot. ive tried new memory, new psu and versions 9.10(32bit and 64bit and 10.04 and all do the same thing
didnt know empathy has voice and video
dunno why anyone would run ubuntu on a mac lol thats like putting a v6 in a mustang
ubuntu runs very well on mac. i have 64 bit and all is well
